org.springframework.data.auditing

类 MappingAuditableBeanWrapperFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.auditing.MappingAuditableBeanWrapperFactory
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AuditableBeanWrapperFactory

    public class MappingAuditableBeanWrapperFactory
extends Object
    AuditableBeanWrapperFactory that will create am AuditableBeanWrapper using mapping information obtained from a MappingContext to detect auditing configuration and eventually invoking setting the auditing values.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.8

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      MappingAuditableBeanWrapperFactory(PersistentEntities entities)
      Creates a new MappingAuditableBeanWrapperFactory using the given PersistentEntities.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Optional<AuditableBeanWrapper> getBeanWrapperFor(Object source)
      Returns an AuditableBeanWrapper if the given object is capable of being equipped with auditing information.

      • MappingAuditableBeanWrapperFactory

        public MappingAuditableBeanWrapperFactory(PersistentEntities entities)
        Creates a new MappingAuditableBeanWrapperFactory using the given PersistentEntities.
        参数:
        entities - must not be null.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getBeanWrapperFor

        public Optional<AuditableBeanWrapper> getBeanWrapperFor(Object source)
        Returns an AuditableBeanWrapper if the given object is capable of being equipped with auditing information.
        指定者:
        getBeanWrapperFor 在接口中 AuditableBeanWrapperFactory
        参数:
        source - the auditing candidate.
        返回:
        the AuditableBeanWrapper for the given source object if it's eligible for auditing.
